review: I took this on vacation with me this summer and found it perfect for watching Netflix and Amazon Prime Video while in a condo.  The setup was dead-dumb easy and everything worked right out of the box.  When we moved from the condo to a hotel later in the vacation, it was again easy to plug in the Fire TV Stick and immediately continue watching a Netflix series.  I can't imaging traveling without the Fire TV Stick on any future trips.
author: Kent L. Weitkamp "kweitkamp"
